game.name: Ruff's Bone
game.shortDescription: Ruff's Bone centers around a day in the life of Ruff, as he anticipates his weekly routine of fetching his trainer's bone. Ruff finds himself chasing the bone into the most unlikely of places! Can you help Ruff recover the bone and make it home?
